trans-unit.source:
Important: This is an experimental feature that will edit your Registry to make OneCommander the default file manager and folder handler (Open/Save dialogs cannot be replaced).
This will make Windows File Explorer unusable - even when clicking a folder in File Explorer the OneCommander will open.
You will need to unregister it by unchecking this option if you ever move or remove OneCommander (uninstalling it will not reverse changes)!
This will also enable running in the background for faster window opening.
Are you absolutely sure you want to proceed and you know how to restore the registry on your own if something fails (no support in case of recovery)?
trans-unit.target:
重要提示：这是一个体验功能，将编辑您的注册表，使 OneCommander 成为默认的文件资源管理器和文件夹处理程序（打开/保存对话框无法被替换)。
这将使 Windows 的文件资源管理器无法使用 - 即使单击文件资源管理器中的文件夹，打开的也是 OneCommander。
如果您想移动或卸载 OneCommander，则需手动注销它 (卸载并不会自动恢复到更改之前)！
这也将启用在后台运行，以便更快地打开窗口。
您真的确定要继续，并且您知道如何在出现故障时自行恢复注册表（如果在恢复时没有支持）？
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Important: This is an experimental feature that will edit Windows Registry to completely replace Windows File Explorer Win+E hotkey. This registry change will make OneCommander open when clicking Explorer shortcut, but won't disable navigation within Explorer. The only way to reverse this is by unchecking this button from OneCommander or running the registry script from OneCommander folder (uninstalling OC won't change it automatically). Proceed?
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：这是一个体验功能，将编辑 Windows 注册表以完全取代 Windows 文件资源管理器的 Win+E 快捷键。此注册表更改将使得在单击资源管理器快捷方式时打开 OneCommander，但不会禁用资源管理器中的导航。恢复到 Windows 默认方式的唯一方法是在 OneCommander 中注销，或者从 OneCommander 文件夹中运行注册表脚本（卸载 OneCommander 不会自动更改它）。继续？
